lead_paragraph: The Hall of Fame announcer Bob Uecker has filed for a restraining order in Milwaukee against a woman who he contends has been harassing him for years and who confronted him at a hotel pool last week over his refusal to assist her charity work. A hearing is scheduled for June 15. A message left at the home of the woman, Ann E. Ladd, was not immediately returned. In court filings, Uecker, the 71-year-old former catcher, said Ladd has been bothering him for six or seven years.
